item.title: Be simple. Be boring. Be obvious.
item.description: On Core.Infra day, I was invited to speak. This is my talk. There were many like it, but this was mine. In operations, code is not your friend. This is about what I did the two years I have not been around here. I first worked for Booking in 2006 as a MySQL consultant doing databasey things. I joined Booking as an employee later, in 2008. By then, I was working in Amsterdam, but living in Berlin, so I was flying around quite a bit.
